1.1.8.name: wordpress/email-subscription
1.1.8.description: The plugin provides a admin page where you can customize the emails to be sent. There is aslo a widget to be customized in the widget panel. The plugin uses wordpress schedule events to schedule emails. For more information see installation page or the Webfish homepage.
